resources.string: Two trails to take an informed look at the IIT Madras campus.Each trail is around 2.5 km long.
The first phase of construction in the campus took place in the 1960s. This trails winds through some of the structures that were built in this period.

Having been created essentially in a forest , the campus of IIT Madras is home to a great many wild animals and to a rich assemblage of plants.This trail leads away from the constructed areas and offers chances of viewing some of these plants and animals.
Some Important Features Have Been Added.
